name: Tepig
flavorText:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks
while shooting fireballs from its nose.
It roasts berries before it eats them.

previous.name: Serperior
previous.flavorText:
It can stop its opponents’
movements with just a glare. It takes
in solar energy and boosts it internally.

next.name: Pignite
next.flavorText:
When its internal fire flares up, its
movements grow sharper and faster.
When in trouble, it emits smoke.

pokemon.name: Tepig

It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks
while shooting fireballs from its nose.
It roasts berries before it eats them.

pokemon.name: Pignite

When its internal fire flares up, its

pokemon.name: Emboar
pokemon.flavorText:
It can throw a fire punch by setting its
fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares
deeply about its friends.
